node.name: UV sterilization Air Purifier MAKE: INDUS
node.description: Compact, portable air purifier with child friendly design and  moderate impact on air filteration. Less maintenance with long life gurantee under economical price value, if working area is residential. (SIZE: 220x125x80mm / WEIGHT: 480 grams / POWER: 100 watts)
node.content: Comprise ultraviolet technology for rapid and safe sterilization of surrounding against residential allergens / Design enables for washroom and kitchen which are only the wet part of home and also for minors because of low intensity of UV rays / Took and Hook make it easy for maneuver from one part of home to another and it does not carry any wire or open part for the chance of leakage of electricity / Effective against disease spreading fleas for minors at monsoon and air germs which are not visible from eye / Technology is approved by Indian standard code and it effectively degrade toxic, harmful gases, air bacteria & fungi / Refilling of UV tube is done after 3 years under economical price.
node.alt: INDUS Handy UV sterilization Air Purifier

node.name: Nanoprotect Air Purifier MAKE: Philips MODEL:  AC1217/20
node.description: A branded technology for maintaining air quality of indoors under index good with auto-purification mode. This air purifier can nickname artificial tree for ageing parents and with touch user interface, it is easy like a mobile phone. (SIZE: 620x390x270mm / WEIGHT: 7.2 Kg / POWER: 1400 watts)
node.content: Dutch technology which is built to run marathon of time with target area under 700 Sqfeet and effective against air pollution range 150-250 ppm / With advance nano protect filter keep your family breath safe / Special auto-purification mode and inbuilt automatic cut off mechanism makes it self-manageable / Healthy air protect alert in form of audio and touch interface on top makes it easy to work / As tested it beats the industrial standards of polluted cities with high conversion rate of bad air quality to good / Discharge is of 9000 Cubicfeet per hour which is above average but quality of air is always stick to good with its application.

node.name: HEPA filter Air Purifier MAKE: RUBY MODEL: 889 series
node.description: Three stage air filterartion, entrap microscopic pollutant & allergens, built with HEPA technology for efficient cure of indoor air. This air purifier use replaceable filter and target approx 200 Sqfeet of area within an hour of time. Under the piggy bank price recommended air purification machine for home users only. (SIZE: 330x203x560mm / WEIGHT: 3.8 Kg / POWER: 1400 watts)
node.content: In first two stage of filtration, activated carbon absorb the microscopic level of pollutants and in third stage HEPA(High Efficiency Particulate Air) filter collects all the pollutants & allergens / Efficiency and durability of filters are quiet high, in fact for daily use of 6 hour it can last for 2 years as per users / As per manufacturer guidelines, user must replace the filter after 18 months if the air quality is moderate(100-200 PPM) and implementation area is within 250 Sqfeet / With noise free working this air filter can be put inside the room of new born baby or old people / Manufacturer provide the 1 year warranty on electrical parts which is more than good for new users of air purifier / Remote control operation is also provided for lazy customers and it is suggested to visit the local electronic store for the filters(SHARP: filter manufacturer) because of size variation.

node.name: HEPA filter Air Purifier MAKE: Mi
node.description: Effective against common air viruses and 100% filtration rate of moderate air quality, this air purifier is mostly prefer by medical clinics where HEPA technology for air purification is mandatory. Easy to change filter and with one button control it could be easily operate by toddlers & olders. (SIZE: 520x240x240mm / WEIGHT: 4.1 Kg / POWER: 1000 watts)
node.content: Upgraded HEPA(High Efficiency Particulate Air) filter technology which can entrap the particle size of 0.3 microns i.e. the size of common air virus and thatâ€™s why it is most recommended air purifier in medical work line / With 360 degree of air suction it can target the area up to 500 Sqfeet which is approximately 1BHK home / With discharge of 12000 Cubicfeet per hour it has potential to clean the air of 4BHK home within an hour while one can check that also on real time air quality indicator, an additional feature of it / Cylindrical filters are easily to replace and as per user manual it is good to replace the filters within 2 years of time.
node.alt: Mi Air Purifier 2C with True HEPA Filter
